column4: i have some problem in ubuntu
well the drive in question you have to change permission for
you should be able to just right clich on it, hit properties, and clic read/write
theres a shell command too i think its chmod but i forget the syntax
you cant see it or its greyed out
yeah you will have to use sudo chmod but im not sure on the syntax
one sec ill see if i can find the command
in terminal: sudo chmod +777 <location of directory>
